tool_description: Parses work experience section to extract job titles, companies, employment dates, responsibilities, and achievements from resume text.

resume_text.description: The full text content of the resume

include_volunteer.description: Include volunteer work and unpaid positions

min_duration_months.description: Minimum job duration in months to include

standardize_titles.description: Standardize job titles to common categories

error_messages: Empty resume text: Provide non-empty resume_text content for processing.
Invalid duration: min_duration_months must be a positive integer between 1 and 120.
No experience section found: The resume may not contain a recognizable work experience section.
Date parsing error: Unable to parse employment dates. Check date format consistency in the resume.
usage: Provide resume_text and configure filtering options for internships, volunteer work, and minimum duration. Enable extract_achievements to capture quantified results and standardize_titles for consistent job categorization.

positions.description: List of job positions with title, company, dates, and key responsibilities

employment_gaps.description: Identified gaps in employment history with duration
